constants.name: deg
constants.description: deg is the conversion factor between degrees and radians.

constants.name: memory
constants.description: A vector of all user defined symbol names.

functions.name: sin
functions.description: Calculates the sine of a given number.

functions.name: cos
functions.description: Calculates the cosine of a given number.

functions.name: tan
functions.description: Calculates the tagent of a given number.

Calculates the sine of a given number.
number in degrees

Calculates the cosine of a given number.
number in degrees

Calculates the tagent of a given number.
number in degrees

Calculates the inverse sine of a given number.
result in degrees

result in degrees

Calculates the inverse tagent of a given number.

functions.name: solve
functions.description: Solves a system of linear equations.

functions.name: nsolve
functions.description:
If possible, solve the equation within the limits.
Default limits: -20, 20

functions.name: nintegral
functions.description: Calculates the definite integral of the function for the given limits.

functions.name: nderive
functions.description: Calculates the value of the (grade)th derivative at the specified position. if grade is not specified: grade = 1

functions.name: table
functions.description:
Calculates a list of [x, f(x)] pairs.
min_x <= x <= max_x
| x_n - x_{n + 1} | = step_size
default step_size = 1

functions.name: ln
functions.description: n. a.

functions.name: log
functions.description: n. a.

functions.name: min
functions.description: n. a.

functions.name: max
functions.description: n. a.

functions.name: sqrt
functions.description:
Calculates the square root of v.
v>=0

functions.name: root
functions.description:
Computes the nth root of v.
n, v >= 0

functions.name: delete
functions.description:
Deletes a user defined symbol.
Returns 1 if the deletion was successful, otherwise 0.
